Summary: I rhought ir was a star or planet but could not identify which one. Then it flashed 3 times and started moving rapidly at about mach 45.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in Clinton Co. PA. It was in the summer of 2010 I was star gazing on a clear night with no clouds and no moon. AS I scanned the skies an unusual starlike object caught my eye. As I watched it for 5 to 10 minutes it remained stationary. I remember asking myself what star or planet this was. I am a frequent star gazer and attended Ga Tech where I studied Aerospace Engineering. Then, before I could identify it the object flashed 3 times and then instantaniously went from stationary to about mach 45 to 47 and within 2 or 3 seconds was completely out of site. This was the only UFO I have seen in my lifetime (over 50 years). I was completely sober and had no medical problems at the time.
